titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the House of Lords at the Abbey-Church of St. Peters Westminster, on Wednesday, 11th of December, 1695 : being the day appointed for a solemn fast and humiliation / by the Right Reverend Father in God James, Lord Bishop of London.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
